contact.name: Mittwald CM Service GmbH & Co. KG

de.mittwald.v1.signup.InternalServerErro.description: Something in our infrastructure went wrong

de.mittwald.v1.signup.NoValidAccessToken.description: No valid access token was provided

de.mittwald.v1.common.RateLimitError.description: Your request ran into a rate limit. You have to wait until rate limit expires

info.description: A json object, given further information about the error

message.description: Some more detailed information about the error

name.description: Unique key for the error type

de.mittwald.v1.signup.Profile.description: The users personal information, e.g. first name.

context.description:
The object with the additional information about the error that can be used to create custom error messages. Keys depend on the
type that failed validation (e.g. "missingProperty" for type "required")

path.description: The path to the part of the data that was validated. JavaScript property access notation (e.g., ".prop[1].subProp") is used.

type.description: ajv validation error type (e.g. "format", "required", "type") or own valiation error types

files.description: A set of config file references.

isGlobal.description: If 'true', then it is one of Mittwalds global templates and the 'projectId' is empty.

updatedAt.description: unix-formatted timestamp for when the template was created or updated last

de.mittwald.v1.common.AccessToken.description: Access Token is required in header
de.mittwald.v1.common.AccessToken.name: x-access-token

token.description: Public token to identify yourself against the api gateway.

  * LoginFailed

barcode.description: base64 encoded barcode content to scan from your mfa app. e.g. `iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAMgAAADIEAAAAADYoy...`. You can display it with ``

url.description:
Same as barcode,  but in URL form. e.g.
`otpauth://totp/Google:test@gmail.com?algorithm=SHA1&digits=6&issuer=Google&period=30&secret=HTXT7KJFVNAJUPYWQRWMNVQE5AF5YZI2"`

200.description: The process of activating Multi Factor Authentication is initialized

  * MFAAlreadyConfirmed

token.description: The token that was send to your email address

parameters.description: tokenId to identify the concrete session
parameters.name: tokenId

get.summary: Get a specific session of an authorized user
List all active sessions of authorized user

400.description: Some of the specified values does not meet our requirements.
Some of the specified values does not meet our requirements.

post.summary: Check, if the current access token is valid

version.description: Semantic version describing all of supported versions

error_context.description:
The 'error_context' may contain validator / error_type specific content like
'line' and 'pos'.

error_message.description:
The 'error_message' may contain a human readable error message,
if the error could be parsed / is known
or the complete, unparsed validator output otherwise.

error_type.description:
The 'error_type' is
* empty, when the stage is successful
* unknown, when the error type is now known / not parsed
* or some validator specific string.

success.description: A validation request is successful, if all stages are successful.

200.description: The config could be validated with this validator. The success state is given in the response.

name.description: The name of the specific validator that should be used.

version.description: The exact version you want to validate against.

post.summary: validate a set of config files with a named validator against a specific version

revision.description: The new version, because on rollback, the content is copied and a new revision is created.

rollbackRef.description: The revision, that is used as the rollback source.

revision.description: Rollback to a specific version. If empty, the config is rolled back to the previous version.

put.summary: Update a config, this will create a new revision.

files.description: A set of config file references.
